_header: Saint Barnabas the apostle that good was & hende
Subjects: saints’ lives; Barnabas, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Barnabas in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Barnabe þe apostel þat good was & hendeImartred
                    he was uor godes loue in strong deþ aten ende…
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ȝerne ihesu crist kyng of alle kyngeVor
                    þe loue of Barnabe þat he ous to heuene bringe

Bod779.First Lines:
seint barnabe þe apostil þat good was & hendemartrid
                    he was for goddus loue in strong deþ at þe ende…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…& þat we moot þer be god ȝeue vs soch
                    graceto sitte in þe ryȝt syde to se oure lordus face

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Barnabe þe Apostel þat good was and hendeImartred
                    was for vr lordes loue in strong deþ atte ende…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we Ihesu crist þat is kyng of alle kyngeffor
                    loue of seint Barnabe þat he to heuene vs bringe. Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
SEint Barnabe þe Apostle þat guod was and hiendeI Martred
                    he was for godes loue in strongue deþe at þenende…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Nov bidde we ȝeorne ihesu crist king of alle kingeffor
                    loue of Seint Barnabe þat he us to heouene bringue
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 26-9.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint barnabe þe Apostle þat god was & hendeMartired
                    was for godes loue In strong detht atte nende…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ȝerne Ihesu Crist king of all thingeffor
                    þe loue of seint barnabe þat he vs to heuene bringe
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

OxfTri57.First Lines:
Seint Barnabe þe appostel þat guod man was and hendeI
                    martrid was for godis sone in strong deþ atte nende…
OxfTri57.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we ȝerne ihesu crist kyng of alle kyngeffor
                    þe loue of seint Barnabe þat vs to heuene brynge

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein Barnabe þe apostel þat god was and hendeI martred
                    was for godes loue in strong deþ atte nende…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…Nou bidde we ȝeorne ihesu crist king of alle kyngeffor
                    þe loue of sein barnabe þat us to heuene bringe

D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Barnabe þe Apostel þat goed man was &
                    hendeymartred was ffor godes loue in strong deþ atten
                    ende…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Now bidde we ȝeorne Ihesu crist þat is kyng ouer alle
                    þingeffor þe loue of Seint Barnabe þat he vs to heuene
                    bringe

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint barnabe þe apostel þat goud was & hendey
                    martryd was for godis loue in stronge deþ at þan
                    ende…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Now bydde we ȝerne ihesu crist kyng of al kyngfor loue
                    of seint barnabe to heuene þat he ous bringe

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
SEin Barnabe þe apostel þat gode was & hendey
                    Martrede was for godes love & stronge deþ attenende…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
…Now praye we ȝerne ihesu crist kyng of alle kynggefor
                    þe love of Sein barnabe þat vs to heuene bringe
BLAdd10301.Attributed Title:
De Sancto Barnabe (f. 96, by scribe in margin beside first line);
                        Barnaba (RT)

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: Sein Barnabe þe apostel þat god was & hendeymartiret he was for godes loue in strong deþ aten ende…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou bidde we ȝerne ihesu crist king of alle kingefor þe loue of sein barnabe þat he ous to heuen bringe
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xlv” added to right margin by later hand (f. 89).

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint barnabe þapostle þat god was & hendeImarterd was for godes loue in stronge deþe attan ende…
BLHar2277.Last Lines: …Nou bidde we ȝurne to ihesu crist king of alle kingeffor þe loue of Seint barnabe þat he ous to heuene bringe

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt barnabe þe Apostle þat was so gode &
                    hendeMartired he was for goddes love with harde deþ at his
                    ende…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Now pray we ȝerne to Ihesu lord of all þingeffor
                    love of saynt barnabe to heuen þat he vs bringe Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seint Bernard þe appostel was good & eke hendeAnd marterd
                    was for goddis loue er he hens wende…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…Now prey we Ihesu crist kyng aboue kyngFor þe loue of
                    seynt Barnabe vs to Ioye bring. Amen.
